itunes:title: #122: The 3 Things You Don't Need to Apologize For
title: #122: The 3 Things You Don't Need to Apologize For
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: There are three things we never need to apologize for. Our boundaries, our identity, and our voice are so important and valuable to us.   RESOURCES MENTIONED  Join our weekly text inspiration list by texting PODCAST to 832-219-7815  to unlearn...
itunes:summary:
There are three things we never need to apologize for. Our boundaries, our identity, and our voice are so important and valuable to us.

 

RESOURCES MENTIONED

  • Join our weekly text inspiration list by texting PODCAST to 832-219-7815
  • Join The Recovery School 2.0 to unlearn symptoms of love addiction and love avoidance
  • Apply to work together in From Avoidant to Available
  • Create balance and love in your life with The Loved Woman Planner


CONNECT WITH US ELSEWHERE
Instagram: @BlackGirlsHeal
Facebook: Black Girls Heal
Website: Blackgirlsheal.org
